mapper.sql: id, access_class, access_method, access_time, address, ip
mapper.update: update accesslog set access_class = #{accessClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_method = #{accessMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_time = #{accessTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
